original_text: Nay but, O man, who art thou that repliest against God? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it, Why hast thou made me thus?
korean_text: 이 사람아 네가 누구이기에 감히 하나님께 반문하느냐 지음을 받은 물건이 지은 자에게 어찌 나를 이같이 만들었느냐 말하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: who art thou that repliest against God?
Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it,
sentences.korean_translation: 만들어진 것이 그것을 만든 자에게 말하겠느냐,

sentences.original_text: Why hast thou made me thus?
